title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Analysis of Language Classroom Material Utilization: Case Study-Based Pedagogical Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze specific instructional cases by applying observation and interview techniques for textbook utilization analysis
Learners can identify and evaluate educational decision-making factors that arise during the textbook selection and utilization process
Learners can visualize and comparatively analyze textbook utilization strategies using the MUA (Materials Use Arc) model

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
